tagline: Card games with live DJ's every Thursday & Friday
rules:
Welcome to the Card Game Conisseurs SMASHED instance

OUR CODE OF CONDUCT

1. Do not block or mute any official SMASHED staff members or our own.

2. 18+ Only.

3. Follow VRChat's TOS.

4. No discrimination, bullying or unnecessary drama.

5. Be civil, act your age.

6. No portals to any other club worlds.

7. Pace yourself. Don't drink until you drop!

8. Suspicious activity will not be tolerated.

9. Upper torsos may be exposed. Viewer discretion is advised.

Like what we do? Join the Discord!

https://discord.gg/NCEx9Baa9z
infoBoard:
Welcome to Card Game Connoisseurs, the reason every main SMASHED lobby pops off after 11pm EST. We used to run everyday and push hard to bring a loyal crowd in, ever since then we've scaled back operations to share the success with other groups, weather they admit it or not, they "blew up" because of us.

We operate on Thursday and Friday, starting at 11pm EST onwards.

Our biggest mistake was sharing our success with others.
